content: Good afternoon. Is it possible to delete a dataset and its files? A researcher created a dataset with test data and he asked me, as dataverse administrator, to delete them.
sender_full_name: Adília Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves

content: @Adília Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves hi! You probably want "destroy" - https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.5/api/native-api.html#delete-published-dataset
